claim: Flublok is approved for adults 18 years and older

rejected_evidence.quote: Flublok is approved for use in persons 18 years of age and older. (1)
rejected_evidence.original_explanation: This quote directly states that Flublok is approved for use in individuals who are 18 years of age and older, which supports the claim regarding its approved age range.

rejected_evidence.quote: HIGHLIGHTS OF PRESCRIBING INFORMATION These highlights do not include all the information needed to use Flublok® safely and effectively. See full prescribing information for Flublok. Flublok (Influenza Vaccine) Injection for Intramuscular Use 2024-2025 Formula ... vaccine. Flublok is approved for use in persons 18 years of age and older. (1)
rejected_evidence.original_explanation: This section from the official prescribing information highlights that Flublok is approved for use in adults 18 years and older, providing regulatory context for the claim.

rejected_evidence.quote: Safety and effectiveness of Flublok have not been established in children 3 years to less than 18 years of age.
rejected_evidence.original_explanation: By stating that safety and effectiveness have not been established in those under 18, this quote reinforces that Flublok is only approved for adults 18 years and older.
